name: ByteRover Ship & Handoff
description: Complete milestones with retrospective and archival, or pause work with resumable handoff context
long_description: A structured workflow for wrapping up work â€” either completing a milestone (shipping) or pausing work mid-phase (handoff). Shipping runs a pre-flight audit, gathers stats, produces a retrospective, evolves the project record, and optionally creates a git tag. Pausing compresses current work state into a resumable handoff stored via brv curate for seamless session continuation.
